title: Burning calories is a piece of cake! Any fatasses in GD?
body:
So look, a 160 pound person burns 70 calories in 1 hour sitting and playing video games then for the whole day they would have burned 1400 calories.

You could burn 70 calories jogging half a mile. (4 minutes of running and 6 minutes of jogging)
ONLY 6 MINUTES OF YOUR LIFE.
But obviously if you are unfit, it's 6 minutes of torture.

Here is the scary part.
If you are walking....
Walking for 6 minutes burns 15 calories.

That is too much work for 15 calories. 6 minutes of walking is like walking 5 blocks in NYC.
